import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link' import Head from 'next/head' import Router from 'next/router' import styled from 'styled-components'; import { space, display, typography, color, border, flexbox, grid, layout, background, } from 'styled-system' import Nav from '../components/Nav' import Footer from '../components/Footer' const HeroSection = styled.section( { boxSizing: 'border-box', }, layout, space, display, flexbox, ); const HeroContent = styled.div( {}, display, flexbox, layout, ); const HeroTitle = styled.h1( { textAlign: 'center', '& strong': { position: 'relative', }, '& strong::after': { content: JSON.stringify(""), position: 'absolute', right: -8, bottom: 8, width: '95%', height: '24px', background: '#1BE7FF', display: 'block', zIndex: '-1' } }, typography, color, space, display, ); const HeroSubtitle = styled.span( {}, typography, color, space, display, ); const HeroCTAContainer = styled.form( { boxSizing: 'border-box' }, display, layout, flexbox, space, ); const HeroCTAInput = styled.input( { boxSizing: 'border-box' }, border, flexbox, space, typography, color, display, ); const HeroCTAButton = styled.input( { boxSizing: 'border-box', transition: 'background-color 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0ms', ':hover': { backgroundColor: '#fff', color: '#1a1a1a', } }, border, flexbox, space, typography, color, ); const HeroCTACaption = styled.span( { textAlign: 'center', }, typography, color, display, layout, ); const Hero = ({ email, handleSubmit, handleChange }) => ( Your menu deserves better. Take control of your diners' conversion path with OurMenu. Rich interactions, powerful customizability, and valueable insights all come together in one powerful tool, right where diners are. handleSubmit(e)}> handleChange(e.target.value)} /> 14-day free trial Custom setup Cancel anytime ); const Callout = styled.section( {}, display, flexbox, space, ); const CalloutTitle = styled.h2( { textAlign: 'center', '& strong': { position: 'relative', }, '& strong::after': { content: JSON.stringify(""), position: 'absolute', right: -8, bottom: 8, width: '95%', height: '24px', background: '#1BE7FF', display: 'block', zIndex: '-1' } }, typography, color, space, display, ); const CalloutSubtitle = styled.span( {}, typography, color, space, display, layout, ); const Grid = styled.section( {}, display, ); const GridItem = styled.article( { boxSizing: 'border-box', }, display, layout, space, grid, color, ); const GridShowcase = styled.div( { boxSizing: 'border-box', }, color, space, display, flexbox, background, ); const GridContent = styled.div( {}, display, flexbox, space, ); const GridItemTitle = styled.h3( {}, typography, color, space, ); const GridItemText = styled.p( { }, typography, color, space, ); const GridItemButton = styled.a( { float: "left", cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'background-color 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0ms, color 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0ms', ':hover': { background: 'white', color: '#1a1a1a' } }, border, color, display, flexbox, space, typography, layout, ); class Index extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { email: "", } } handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() Router.push({ pathname: '/request-demo', query: { email: this.state.email } }) } render() { return (
Menu management that fuels growth | OurMenu
this.handleSubmit(e)} handleChange={(email) => this.setState({email})} email={this.state.email} /> OurMenu is the menu management platform of tomorrow
for the restaurants of today. 93% of diners look at a menu online. Now, they are interacting with outdated PDFs or being taken off of your site to a third party. Thats sacrificing valuable opportunities for engagement and insight.
The OurMenu Widget Have diners visiting your website interacting with your menu immediately. No more digging through pages to find a plain PDF. The OurMenu widget embeds a powerful and feature-rich menu right on your homepage.

While diners search, interact, and convert, you gain valuable insights into their activity and how your menu performs.
Get a custom demo
Features for Growth Every day, hungry diners are looking at your menu, waiting to be converted. OurMenu gives you the perfect tools and expertise to make this happen.

Target and engage diners right on your website with the OurMenu widget. Retain and grow your customer base with intelligent insights and social media integrations. All of this provided with our signature silver service approach makes OurMenu the perfect partner to drive your restaurants growth.
See what sets us apart
The Silver Service Approach We are invested in your long-term growth. To accomplish this, we get to know every restaurant personally and understand their unique goals. Communication is key, so whether its a feature request, support ticket, or adding a special to your menu, were available over email, phone, text, Messenger, WhatsApp, and our hologram is coming soon.
See how fast we are
); } } export default Index;
